title: I finished a game well over an hour ago and it wants me to reconnect to it

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I finished a game and it didnt load the end game screen. I then went to play another one and it said i was currently in a game so i restarted my client. It is now stuck on a reconnect screen. Ive checked my internet connection, reinstalled,  and repaired and nothing has happened. Rito Plz Save Me

replies.body: I have recently been informed these are called ghost games and will go away on their own after a while. 8 hours tops, but usually only a few. Means you can't play anymore tonight though so sorry about that :(

hahah who says i aint gunna be up when it goes away :P
thanks anways
Well then maybe you did get to play :P I suppose I shouldn't assume, who needs sleep anyway right?

The same thing occurred to me after I finished an ARAM match with a friend two hours ago. I asked him if he had encountered the very same problem and he has said he did so the both of us logged off and on again while awaiting for it to be fixed but the very same screen appeared so I guess like what Seras Dragon said, it should be something to wait for unfortunately :(
